resources.string: Welcome to StrangerDanger. Let\'s get started...

StrangerDanger is an application created to help facilitate safety everywhere. Built by 6 OSU CSE students, the app allows individuals to quickly and easily notify loved-ones if they are in trouble. The goal of this app is that with a simple button click or rapid shake, all your ICE contacts can be notified that you fear danger as well as your exact location.
